author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND WEAKENS TO A DEPRESSION... ...ALL TROPICAL STORM WARNINGS DISCONTINUED...
summary: ...RAYMOND WEAKENS TO A DEPRESSION... ...ALL TROPICAL STORM WARNINGS DISCONTINUED... As of 11:00 AM MST Sat Oct 11 the center of Raymond was located near 21.7, -109.6 with movement NNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...RAYMOND WEAKENS TO A DEPRESSION... ...ALL TROPICAL STORM WARNINGS DISCONTINUED... As of 11:00 AM MST Sat Oct 11 the center of Raymond was located near 21.7, -109.6 with movement NNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
